state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant user
    participant browser
    participant server

    user->>browser: Providing some data such as "Hello, this is a new note" to the text field
    user->>browser: Clicking on the 'Save' button

    Note right of browser: Upon clicking the 'Save' button the user input is sent to the server
    browser->>server: POST https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/new_note
    activate server
    server-->>browser: HTTP Status code '302' 
    deactivate server
    Note left of server: The status code '302' is URL Redirect, which requesst browser to do a new HTTP GET request to /notes location

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/notes
    
    Note right of browser: The HTTP GET request causes the page reload which generates 3 GET requests as follows:
    
    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the css file
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.js
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the JavaScript file
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser starts executing the JavaScript code that fetches the JSON from the server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    server-->>browser: [{ "content": "HTML is easy", "date": "2023-1-1" }, ... ]
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser executes the callback function that renders the notes
    browser-->>user: The value submitted by the user is displayed in the notes list
